snippet: The measure's sponsor, Sen. Daniel L. Squadron said his bill would also require promoters to stamp charitable tickets with a warning that they cannot be resold for a profit.
abstract: The measure's sponsor, Sen. Daniel L. Squadron said his bill would also require promoters to stamp charitable tickets with a warning that they cannot be resold for a profit.

headline.main: Bill Seeks to Make Resale of Tickets for Benefit Concerts Illegal
headline.print_headline: Bill Aims at Scalpers Of Charity Event Tickets
